questionText: Most viruses enter computers via email attachments.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: Computer viruses have damaged computers throughout the world.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: The origin of the Melissa virus has been traced to David Smith of New Jersey.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: The Chernobyl virus enters in e-mail, floppies, or downloaded software.
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: A worm does no direct damage to the computer.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: The Dhaka virus is also known as the T-virus.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: A worm insinuates itself among programs and attaches itself to every message sent.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y

questionText: W32/Kriz.3862 was set to strike on Christmas.
author: A2CCK1JKX48R0H

questionText: Melissa makes its way into computers as an e-mail attachment .
author: ANCCKNF1DKRZO

questionText: Precautions include making backups of all important files.
author: AJQGWGESKQT4Y
